def sort_tuples(list_to_sort):
    new_list = []
    for element in list_to_sort:
        i = 0
        while i < len(new_list) and element[0] > new_list[i][0]:
            i += 1
        new_list.insert(i, element)

    new_list.sort(key=lambda tup: tup[1])
